subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: F.C. Barcelona routed F.C. Basel, 5-0, and is on the verge of reaching the next round of the Champions League. Barcelona is the only team in the 32-club competition to have a perfect record through three games after Liverpool played to a 1-1 draw at Atlético Madrid. John Terry’s 77th-minute header off a corner kick gave Chelsea a 1-0 win over A.S. Roma. Inter beat Anorthosis Famagusta, 1-0, to take control of its group, while PSV Eindhoven, Bordeaux and Sporting Lisbon also won.
